# formatDescriptionReplacements

**Instance Property**

The replacement format descriptions.

## Declaration

```swift
var formatDescriptionReplacements: [AVCompositionTrackFormatDescriptionReplacement] { get }
```

## Discussion

The property’s values specify an original and a replacement format description, as set in a previous call to [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMutableCompositionTrack/replaceFormatDescription(_:with:)].

## Managing format descriptions

- **formatDescriptions**: The format descriptions of the media samples that a track references.
- **AVCompositionTrackFormatDescriptionReplacement**: An object that represents a format description and its replacement.
